about_the_game:
LaughterLost plunges you into a surreal journey through the complexities of work and family life in a dystopian world. Face psychological twists and turn the tide of your destiny through narrative decisions. Navigate challenging puzzles and unexpected unique confrontations! Each choice you make shapes your experience in this enthralling cycle of everyday trials. Will you uncover the path to perseverance or succumb to the pressures of this warped existence? Explore the depths of LaughterLost and discover if you can survive. Will you break this dystopian cycle of life?






Engaging Narrative Story
Engage in narrative decisions that will make or break you, in your journey through family and work life. Can you defend your livelihood in this cruel, unforgiving world?



Solve Intricate Puzzles
Navigate intricate puzzles that challenge your problem-solving skills in this surreal and dystopian world. Solving puzzles advances you through the narrative while you discover the mysteries of this cycle of everyday existence.



BECOME the Final Boss
Confront unique and intense confrontations that epitomize the distinctive challenges of your character's dystopian journey. Test your skills against unexpected foes, introducing dramatic twists in an already twisted world




Message from Mix Studio:

"Exploring the diverse facets of laughter inspired by the theme, our team discussed various ways and meanings of smiling, embarking on a journey to dissect its complexities. We pondered the nuances of genuine laughter born from humor and joy, juxtaposed with the façade of artificial smiles often worn in social settings or to mask inner turmoil. Our exploration led us to the perspective of a middle-class worker facing the imminent threat of job loss. In this narrative, we unveiled different kinds of smiles: the obligatory smile in the presence of superiors, the strained smiles concealing stress, and the genuine moments of joy shared with loved ones, such as his daughter.

Our main goal is to discover the multifaceted nature of smiles and delve into broader societal themes. Through gameplay, we aim to provoke contemplation on labor challenges and the pervasive drinking culture prevalent in China."

name: LaughterLost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: LaughterLost takes you through a surreal journey of work and family life. Face psychological twists, narrative choices, puzzles, and unexpected unique confrontations! Will you break this dystopian cycle of everyday life?
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
